title: Blended Learning-Based Elementary Mathematics Practical Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Fundamental Mathematics Concepts and Elementary Education Foundations
context.additional_context: A course for current elementary practitioners to strengthen math instruction capabilities in blended learning environments. Combines online (theory) and offline (practice/simulation) activities with VR simulations for field-immersive educational experiences

learning_goals: Enhance the ability to systematically explain core concepts of elementary mathematics (operations, geometry, measurement, etc.) in blended learning environments.
Design and implement at least three types of mathematics teaching methods applicable to real classroom settings using VR simulations.
Collaboratively develop and share instructional materials with peer teachers through online-offline interactions.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
